name: Quetzal Islands
description:
In this game you will embody a bird, more precisely a "quetzal", so you will be able to explore this small universe with a dreamlike atmosphere and contemplate the horizon by flying through the skies.

Controls :

  • Z, S : manage speed
  • Spacebar : aerial figure
  • Mouse : orientation

(Joystick supported)

This game was developed by six students over five days as part of a student workshop whose theme was "the horizon":

-Victor Mauroy (GD, LD, prog, integrator)

-Raphaël Horion (Tech Art, VFX, prog)

-Sebastien Lepers (3D, Texturing, integrator)

-Mathilde Schmitt (3D, Texturing)

-Théo Lefin (Sound Design, 3D)

-Lucas Dupont (DA, 3D, Texturing)
